com.youama.nexus.core.net

Class Connection

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.youama.nexus.core.net.Connection

  • public class Connection
extends Object
    This class handles a single HTTP or HTTPS connection. It support redirection and history recording.
    Since:
    2015.06.28.
    Author:
    David Belicza - 87.bdavid@gmail.com

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected HttpURLConnection connection
      The connection object for later streaming.
      protected int connectionTimeout
      Connection timeout in seconds.
      protected int readTimeout
      Reading timeout in seconds.
      protected int redirectionCounter
      The redirection what are already processed.
      protected boolean redirectionEnabled
      It enables HTTP and HTTPS redirection.
      protected int redirectionLimit
      The limit number.
      protected ArrayList<Integer> statusHistory
      The history of the redirection by status code.
      protected ArrayList<String> urlHistory
      The history of the redirection by URLs.

    • Field Detail

      • connection

        protected HttpURLConnection connection
        The connection object for later streaming.

      • statusHistory

        protected ArrayList<Integer> statusHistory
        The history of the redirection by status code. The index is also the redirection counter.

      • urlHistory

        protected ArrayList<String> urlHistory
        The history of the redirection by URLs. The index is also the redirection counter.

      • redirectionEnabled

        protected boolean redirectionEnabled
        It enables HTTP and HTTPS redirection.

      • redirectionLimit

        protected int redirectionLimit
        The limit number. How many redirection should be allowed.

      • redirectionCounter

        protected int redirectionCounter
        The redirection what are already processed.

      • connectionTimeout

        protected int connectionTimeout
        Connection timeout in seconds.

      • readTimeout

        protected int readTimeout
        Reading timeout in seconds.

        public Connection()

    • Method Detail

      • setRedirectionLimit

        public void setRedirectionLimit(int redirectionLimit)
        It sets the redirection limit to the property.
        Parameters:
        redirectionLimit - The limit number. How many redirection should be allowed.

      • setConnectionTimeout

        public void setConnectionTimeout(int connectionTimeout)
        Parameters:
        connectionTimeout - Timeout in seconds.

      • setReadTimeout

        public void setReadTimeout(int readTimeout)
        Parameters:
        readTimeout - Timeout in seconds.

      • setRedirectionEnabled

        protected void setRedirectionEnabled(boolean redirectionEnabled)
        It sets redirection in property to enabled or disabled.
        Parameters:
        redirectionEnabled - It has to be true to enable redirection.

      • getStatusHistory

        public ArrayList<Integer> getStatusHistory()
        It retrieves the stored status codes from responses.
        Returns:
        The status codes from response.

      • getUrlHistory

        public ArrayList<String> getUrlHistory()
        It retrieves the stored urls from responses.
        Returns:
        The urls of connection.

      • getConnection

        public HttpURLConnection getConnection()
        Returns:
        The connection object. It can be null.

      • connectWithEnabledRedirects

        public boolean connectWithEnabledRedirects(String stringUrl)
        Connects to the host by URL. This connection method allows the redirection. Anyway, connection object will be stored in the property for later streaming.
        Parameters:
        stringUrl - Regular HTTP or HTTPS url.
        Returns:
        It is false when the connection has failed.

      • connectWithoutRedirects

        public boolean connectWithoutRedirects(String stringUrl)
        Connects to the host by URL. This connection method does not allow the redirection. Anyway, connection object will be stored in the property for later streaming.
        Parameters:
        stringUrl - Regular HTTP or HTTPS url.
        Returns:
        It is false when the connection has failed.

      • makeNewGetConnection

        protected boolean makeNewGetConnection(String stringUrl)
        This method builds the connection and saves it to the property. However, it is a recursive method, so it is capable to follows the redirection. When there no more redirection, it saves the connection object to the property and it retrieves true. It watches the number of redirection and timeout.
        Parameters:
        stringUrl - Regular HTTP or HTTPS url.
        Returns:
        It is true when connection has succeed.

      • isRedirectionLoop

        protected boolean isRedirectionLoop()
        It retrieves that there are too many redirection or are not by the setted property.
        Returns:
        It is true when there are too many redirection. It means it is an infinite loop.

      • isRedirectionRequired

        protected boolean isRedirectionRequired(HttpURLConnection connection)
        It checks that response header contains request for redirection.
        Parameters:
        connection - The connection object.
        Returns:
        It is true when redirection is required by response.

      • addToHistory

        protected void addToHistory(HttpURLConnection connection)
        It adds the current URL and response status to the property.
        Parameters:
        connection - The connection object.
